about_the_game:
Overview:

Aeos: The 18 Plus NSFW Adventure generator is an open world campaign based adventure and RPG video game featuring two main characters currently, with options to choose from male or a female protagonist.

Twin rival neer do well families send their misbegotten heirs to a land of plenty in hopes of capturing its spoils. Unknown to them, forces are at work, and a clash of rivals will be their greed and ambitions undoing as they push their heirs into the enemy. And as many will learn from traveling across the lands as vastly magical and wild as Aeos: sometimes, those who choose to leave home as exiles find power in the journey itself, only to return home conquerors.

Godhood, kingdom, and city management are coming with Chapter 2! Please choose your favorite kingdom and prepare to establish them as a permanent force in Aeos, but be warned, war looms, and some kingdoms will be lining up to try and tear you down before you even get settled.

content_descriptors.notes:
Aeos is an adventure generator where the player can choose either a campaign or sandbox approach to our virtual world. In this virtual world, many interactions can lead to sexual content, nudity, and instances of violence, and the ability to choose one's preferences along the way. Aeos will include turning on and off NSFW or just selecting types of adult content events in later updates, especially for RPG lovers looking to play around with others. (Ghost mode. Wooooooo). Currently, the player chooses a character with a pre-disposition to their sexuality and scenes, which currently include m/f and f/f.

Aeos is on the lighter side of the spectrum with how we approach our sexual content. We focus on playing in a vibrant, massive, everchanging virtual world while maintaining frequent NSFW elements; however, corruption branches can put players with certain play styles into more frequent types of sexual content.

For the time being, players should expect frequent nudity and deliberate or spontaneous mature content until they familiarize themselves with our game's atmosphere and interactions.
